author: Ashleigh Fields
description: Comedian Bill Maher on Friday echoed calls for Health and Human Services Secretary Robert F. Kennedy Jr. to resign.  "It’s just – he’s got to go," Maher told viewers during the Friday episode of “Real Time with Bill Maher.” Maher described Kennedy as “nutty” after a series of removals of top advisers and Centers for...
title: Maher: RFK Jr. has ‘got to go’ after fiery Senate hearing

author: Ashley N. Soriano
description: Life-threatening surf and rip currents are possible, though the storm is expected to weaken into the week.
title: Hurricane Kiko approaching Hawaiian islands as Category 4

author: Ashleigh Fields
description: Congress is racing to avert a government shutdown as a Sept. 30 deadline looms, with Democrats threatening to withhold necessary votes to keep the nation funded. This pushback from Democrats, paired with divisions within the Republican conference, threaten to derail funding negotiations. Several lawmakers, including Reps. Ashley Hinson (R-Iowa), who serves on the House Appropriations...
title: Sunday shows preview: Congress scrambles ahead of shutdown deadline as Trump economy sputters

author: Filip Timotija
description: Former President Biden selected his home state of Delaware as the site for his presidential library, tasking a group of friends and former aides with beginning a fundraising push to complete the venture.  The library’s governing board, greenlighted by the Joe and Jill Foundation, will consist of 13 members, including former Secretary of State Anthony...
title: Biden selects Delaware as site of presidential library, begins fundraising push

description: Corporate America has the opportunity to step up and fill the void left by the US government's retreat from global health leadership, creating a healthier world and securing market positions for generations to come.
title: As US retreats from global health, corporations must fill the void

author: Ashleigh Fields
description: Thousands of people descended on the White House during a Saturday march from Malcolm X Park to Lafayette Park in protest of the Trump administration’s crackdown on crime in the nation’s capital.  Demonstrators entitled the effort “We Are All DC,” representing the potential ripple effects of military force on local citizens, spurred by the president. ...
title: March descends on DC against Trump takeover

description: The CDC has been accused of manipulating data, censoring debate, and colluding with Big Tech to silence dissenting physicians, betraying its mission to protect Americans from infectious disease and necessitating a top-to-bottom house cleaning to restore trust.

description: Rep. Scott Perry (R-Pa.) on Saturday defended the Trump administration's moves in the Caribbean, suggesting Venezuela is working with Russia to traffic drugs into the U.S. "One of the biggest concerns I think is, of course, that Venezuela is now a puppet state for Russia, and of course, Russia is at this point involved in...

description: Illinois Gov. JB Pritzker (D) lambasted President Trump on Saturday for joking about immigration enforcement efforts, including plans to target Chicago, calling the president a "wannabe dictator." "The President of the United States is threatening to go to war with an American city," Pritzker wrote on social platform X in response to a meme shared...

description: President Trump has just made perhaps his most dangerous assault on the rule of law. He proudly announced that he directed the U.S. military to kill 11 alleged drug smugglers in their boat on the high seas of the Caribbean, excitedly showing a video of the lethal strike. description: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky rebuffed Russian President Vladimir Putin's invitation for a summit in Moscow, saying Friday that the Kremlin leader “can come to” Kyiv instead.  "He can come to Kyiv.
